description: Detects the use of the bcdedit command to tamper with the boot configuration data. This technique is often times used by malware or attackers as a destructive way before launching ransomware.
author: E.M. Anhaus (originally from Atomic Blue Detections
Endgame)
oscd.community
name: Boot Configuration Tampering Via Bcdedit.EXE
query: (((process.executable.text:"*\\bcdedit.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"bcdedit.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:"*set*" AND (((process.command_line.text:"*bootstatuspolicy*" AND process.command_line.text:"*ignoreallfailures*")) OR ((process.command_line.text:"*recoveryenabled*" AND process.command_line.text:"*no*"))))
